column5: Just got an offer for trade for my scanoe package for the above named ski doo, I don't have any idea as to the worth on the low end, or high end but here's his kijiji ad of the ski doo he's offering.     Please view this ad:  97 Yamaha v-max 500xt for sale or trade , http://www.kijiji.ca/v-snowmobile/hamilton/97-yamaha-v-max-500xt-for-sale-or-trade/1152263259   Thanks for any and all input as I really have no clue!  Lucas
$1500-$2000?  I agree.  Ask him how many kms.  Still a very tough sell this time of the year.

Vmaxs are great sleds that whole their value pretty well, one of those in excellent shape with bigger liquid cooled motor could probably fetch 2500+, but since it's fancooled I wouldn't pay more than 2 in late fall, wouldn't pay more than 1500 right now.  Good sled though
I was going to say 1-2000 bucks.
Decent, maybe something to consider to flip for some cash cause I don't even have $1000 invested into my canoe setup,maybe 700 so that's a pretty good return...  Thanks boys
